thread.title: Fired Southern California coach Steve Sarkisian wishes Trojans good luck on Twitter
thread.title_full: Fired Southern California coach Steve Sarkisian wishes Trojans good luck on Twitter

title: Fired Southern California coach Steve Sarkisian wishes Trojans good luck on Twitter
text:
Fired Southern California coach Steve Sarkisian wishes Trojans good luck on Twitter By The Associated Press   14, 2015 - 11:07 pmLast Updated: October 14, 2015 - 11:07 pm   
Organizations: 
California (1459) 
Fired Southern California coach Steve Sarkisian says on Twitter he is going through "a very difficult time" right now. 
Sarkisian was let go on Monday, one day after he was put on leave. In his first public comments since his dismissal, he wished the Trojans good luck Wednesday and also posted that no one will be cheering them on more than him. 
USC hasn't elaborated on Sarkisian's problems, but he had an embarrassing public display in August at a pep rally where he appeared to be intoxicated while giving a speech. Sarkisian later apologized and said he had combined alcohol and medication, but promised not to drink again during the season. 
Sarkisian also expressed his gratitude on Twitter for the support he had received.
